profile:
National Star Roofing is a family owned and operated company specializing in sloped and flat roofs in the Calgary area since July 2003. It has been rated the Best Roofing Company/Contractor in Calgary by HomeStars and holds an A+ rating with the BBB. 

National Star Roofing is a Preferred Contractor with Owen's Corning, is fully licensed and insured with WCB and is covered by a General Liability Insurance of up $10 million per job. 

Consistently quality work, attention to detail and great customer service is what tells us apart. 
Customer satisfaction is our first priority. 
No payment is required until the job is complete to the owner's satisfaction. Extra charges apply to payments by credit card. 

National Star Roofing's services include sloped roof replacements as well as flat roof repairs/replacements.
services:
Asphalt shingles.
SBS Membrane Flar roofing systems. 
Roofing contracting services.
Re-roof.
Roof Repair.
Residential roofing.
Commercial roofing.
Flat roofing.
name: National Star Roofing Inc.

profile:
At Mega Roofing & Exteriors Inc. we offer a wide range of high-quality exterior services throughout southern Alberta, specializing in all roofing applications, exterior cladding (including vinyl and cement board) soffit/fascia & eavestroughs both 5" & 6". We also offer 24 hour emergency repair response line for any of our services.
Our company's core values are Honesty & Integrity, and we take extreme pride in our workmanship & exceptional customer service. We strive to go above and beyond, to ensure every client's satisfaction, whether it is an eavestrough cleaning, small repair service or a complete exterior renovation (roof, siding, all soft metals). 
We have financing facilities available (OAC).
service_area:
Calgary, Red deer, Airdrie, Okotokes, Nanton, Brooks, Pincher creek
All of Southern Alberta

services:
• New roofs, roof repairs, roof replacement, flat roofs.
• New eavestrough/gutter, 5" & 6" continuous aluminum and steel, downpipe,  eavestrough cleaning, repairs, leaf guard installation.
• New and replacement aluminum soffit/fascia.
• Exterior cladding including vinyl, cement board and engineered/composite wood.
• Attic rain mitigation
• Ice damming mitigation
• Skylight installation & service
• Roof inspections
• Assisting property managers with building envelope needs
